titleStmt.title: Three ordinances of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament. For the better observation of the monethly fast; and more especially the next Wednesday, commonly called the Feast of the Nativity of Christ, thorowout the kingdome of England, and dominion of Wales. Die Jovis, 19 Decemb. 1644. Ordered by the Lords in Parliament assembled, that this ordinance be forthwith printed, and published on the next Lords day in all the churches and chappels within the line of communication and bils of mortality. J. Brown Cler. Parliamentorum.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for I. Wright in the Old baily,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
